Public NotInheritable Class ManagedIdentityApplication Inherits ApplicationBase Implements IManagedIdentityApplication
type ManagedIdentityApplication = class inherit ApplicationBase interface IManagedIdentityApplication interface IApplicationBase

Docs.summary: Class to be used for managed identity applications (on Azure resources like App Services, Virtual Machines, Azure Arc, Service Fabric and Cloud Shell).
Docs.remarks: Managed identity can be enabled on Azure resources as a system assigned managed identity or a user assigned managed identity.
